3: I'm X.
I see... It all makes sense now...
...Why? Why did you do that?
Rawr. Don't mistake it for my intent. I didn't want it this way...
This is all... for the 'Endless Eight Corridor'.
That's a weird place for a title drop.
Oh, um. I feel like someone's after our butts so... I'm trying to end it quick... sorta???
Anyways! Skipping the 2nd OP, again! It'll have to wait until season 2!
Endless...
...Corridor?
Indeed. The war for the swimsuits, in the end, is a war to control summer.
He who controls the swimsuits, controls summer.
And the Leviathan you're wearing is the mediator of the three swimsuits. In other words, Leviathan is an essential key to controlling summer.
And with Rawr being a super-duper-clever-burger, how can I let those three idiots control summer!
So why give it to me?
Whaddya thunk? You think I can wear a swimsuit?
Obviously I can't... but the candy-loving lil' Lucia can.
If you promise to stay here forever, you can have the promised candies.
Heaps. Mountains. Endless. Candies which endureth unto everlasting life.
Just like your gingerbread man cookies?
Eh, don't mind the little stuff.
I do feel something similar to what you describe. But I'm not the one calling for the other swimsuits. The other swimsuits are the ones... calling for me.
...So what do you want to do? Levi?
No. What do you, Lucia, want to do?
You have always been true and good to me.
And now, I trust in your decision.
Oh noes! Run!
No time to explain! Run! Tons of bad guys are coming after us!
But... the story...
Run and narrate! Run and narrate! Just run for now!
...And like that, 'Lucia' saw through the devious plan of X, or Rawr.
X sent an army after 'Lucia', trying to steal Leviathan back from her.
...But X's troops failed.
...Because our 'Lucia' is a superhero with both skill and dash!
COME BACK HERE!!!
She scaled mountainous heights...
She swam across tempestuous seas...
Past terrifying depths...
Through dilapidated ruins...
Sophia and Nanami? What's with the rush?
AH! NOT THE TIME! OUTTA THE WAY!
We need to run or we'll be killed.
Across a mysterious castle in the sky...
Oh! Don't run! It's dangerous!
Not trusting a word from your mouth, you evil swimsuit guardian!
Not running is very bad.
...Swimsuit guardian?
...But they eventually fell into the clutches of the evil swimsuit guardian Karenina.
And yet! A superhero is a superhero! She convinces the three guardians through the power of diplomacy and charisma!
【kuroname】 helped beg for our mercy.
And then... the three swimsuit guardians even willingly gave up their control of summer, and gave the superhero a piece of land all to her own!
She meant we now have a place to play out our stories.
And then and then, the guardians even agreed to pass this tale down!
Ayla found the story interesting and decided to adapt it into a holo-movie.
A splendid, happy ending! World peace, woohoo!
This wouldn't have happened if you didn't doodle in the ruins that were supposed to be restored.
...I'm a bard! A bard has standards!
Watermelon popsicles, anyone? Oh, Commandant, you can't have it.
Me.
The esteemed Bardami... No wait! What! Watermelon popsicles! Me-me-me-me, me!
BREAKING!
What is it this time?
Who needs peace anyway? 'Lucia' decides to travel to the next world, and that's...
I'm a happy-happy guard who gets to wear a kimono.
Fair challenger, come you to this Schrodingerian dreamscape too, to conquer this magical castle?
Azure Weather Rhapsody: Phantasmagoria of Eastern Castle!
COMING! NEVER! Oh, I mean—COMING! NEXT! YEAR! MAYBE! PROBABLY!
